summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Strategic Planning Office; authorizing an Interlocal Agreement with King County for receipt of funds for compliance with requirements of RCW 36.70A.215 to assess development capacity within the Urban Growth Area in King County; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1998 budget of the Strategic Planning Office; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Supplemental Appropriations Account of the Emergency Subfund, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
